meta.label: Twitter tools
meta.description:
Turn DSS into an efficient machine to manage your Twitter account. This plugin contains recipes to:

 * Get information about your followers
 * Get information about who you are following
 * Search for users by multiple keywords
 * Follow and unfollow users from a dataset

For this plugin, you will need to create a Dataiku API key with admin rights
